projects.description: Welcome to Musiker, your new favorite platform to discover emerging artists and groups. Yes, we know. Nowadays, it's hard to navigate the music business. Between the multitude of sites, music streaming platforms, and social media, it's becoming difficult to get noticed and stand out there. New bands and artists are promoted every week, with interviews and various content.

Vaccination around Europe. The world is in the midst of a COVID-19 pandemic. The Vaccinator project was created so easily you could find the vaccination center near you. You have all the contacts needed to get in touch with the center and clarify any doubt! No excuse for not being vaccinated.

Epic gamers is an app designed for board game lovers. Here you may find info about different board games and the best places in the world to buy them and to play them in good company. Throughout the world map, you can find stores and coffee shops across the world!
